entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
